chapters.title: Chapter 24: A Strengthening Storm
chapters.info: Elder Haman, p. 552 (667)—One of the Elders of Stedding Shangtai, son of Dal son of Morel. He came with Loial's mother Covril to find Loial and take him back to the stedding. Loial was not there, and they have not been able to catch up with him. Loial intentionally skipped Stedding Shantai on his trips to the stedding so as to avoid Haman and his mother. See also Loial.
